title: Add dark mode toggle
body:
**Feature Request**

We should add a dark mode toggle to the application.

**Use Case**
Many users prefer dark mode for reduced eye strain, especially when using the app at night.

**Proposed Solution**
- Add toggle in settings
- Persist user preference
- Apply dark theme throughout app

**Alternatives Considered**
- Auto dark mode based on system settings
- Time-based dark mode

**Additional Context**
Dark mode is becoming a standard feature in modern applications.
